CurriculumVitae.description: This class is the data model of the `cv` field.

email.description: The email address of the person.
email.title: Email

photo.description: Path to the photo of the person, relatie to the input file.
photo.title: Photo

phone.description: The phone number of the person, including the country code.
phone.title: Phone

social_networks.description: The social networks of the person.
social_networks.title: Social Networks

CurriculumVitae.title: CurriculumVitae

theme.description: The theme of the CV. It just changes the default values.
theme.title: Theme

theme.description: The theme of the CV. It just changes the default values.
theme.title: Theme

Locale.description:
This class is the data model of the locale catalog. The values of each field
updates the `locale` dictionary.

language.description: The language as an ISO 639 alpha-2 code. It is used for hyphenation patterns.
language.title: Language

phone_number_format.description: If 'national', phone numbers are formatted without the country code. If 'international', phone numbers are formatted with the country code. The default value is "national"
phone_number_format.title: Phone Number Format

page_numbering_template.description:
The template of the page numbering. The following placeholders can be used:
- NAME: The name of the person
- PAGE_NUMBER: The current page number
- TOTAL_PAGES: The total number of pages
- TODAY: Today's date with `locale.date_template`
The default value is "NAME - Page PAGE_NUMBER of TOTAL_PAGES".
page_numbering_template.title: Page Numbering Template

last_updated_date_template.description:
The template of the last updated date. The following placeholders can be used:
- TODAY: Today's date with `locale.date_template`
The default value is "Last updated in TODAY".
last_updated_date_template.title: Last Updated Date Template

date_template.description:
The template of the date. The following placeholders can be used:
-FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
The default value is "MONTH_ABBREVIATION YEAR".
date_template.title: Date Template

month.description: Translation of the word "month" in the locale.
month.title: Translation of "Month"

months.description: Translation of the word "months" in the locale.
months.title: Translation of "Months"

year.description: Translation of the word "year" in the locale.
year.title: Translation of "Year"

years.description: Translation of the word "years" in the locale.
years.title: Translation of "Years"

present.description: Translation of the word "present" in the locale.
present.title: Translation of "Present"

to.description: The word or character used to indicate a range in the locale (e.g., "2020 - 2021").
to.title: Translation of "To"

abbreviations_for_months.description: Abbreviations of the months in the locale.
abbreviations_for_months.title: Abbreviations of Months

full_names_of_months.description: Full names of the months in the locale.
full_names_of_months.title: Full Names of Months

Locale.title: Locale

theme.description: The theme of the CV. It just changes the default values.
theme.title: Theme

RenderCVSettings.description: This class is the data model of the RenderCV settings.

date.description: The date that will be used everywhere (e.g., in the output file names, last updated date, computation of time spans for the events that are currently happening, etc.). The default value is the current date.
date.title: Date

render_command.description: RenderCV's `render` command settings. They are the same as the command line arguments. CLI arguments have higher priority than the settings in the input file.
render_command.title: Render Command Settings

bold_keywords.description: The keywords that will be bold in the output. The default value is an empty list.
bold_keywords.title: Bold Keywords

RenderCVSettings.title: RenderCVSettings

RenderCommandSettings.description: This class is the data model of the `render` command's settings.

design.description: The file path to the yaml file containing the `design` field separately.
design.title: `design` Field's YAML File

rendercv_settings.description: The file path to the yaml file containing the `rendercv_settings` field separately.
rendercv_settings.title: `rendercv_settings` Field's YAML File

locale.description: The file path to the yaml file containing the `locale` field separately.
locale.title: `locale` Field's YAML File

output_folder_name.description:
The name of the folder where the output files will be saved. The following placeholders can be used:
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
- NAME: The name of the CV owner
- NAME_IN_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in snake case
- NAME_IN_LOWER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower snake case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper snake case
- NAME_IN_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in kebab case
- NAME_IN_LOWER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower kebab case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper kebab case
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
The default value is "MONTH_ABBREVIATION YEAR".
The default value is "rendercv_output".
output_folder_name.title: Output Folder Name

pdf_path.description:
The path to copy the PDF file to. If it is not provided, the PDF file will not be copied. The following placeholders can be used:
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
- NAME: The name of the CV owner
- NAME_IN_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in snake case
- NAME_IN_LOWER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower snake case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper snake case
- NAME_IN_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in kebab case
- NAME_IN_LOWER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower kebab case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper kebab case
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
The default value is "MONTH_ABBREVIATION YEAR".
The default value is null.
pdf_path.title: PDF Path

typst_path.description:
The path to copy the Typst file to. If it is not provided, the Typst file will not be copied. The following placeholders can be used:
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
- NAME: The name of the CV owner
- NAME_IN_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in snake case
- NAME_IN_LOWER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower snake case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper snake case
- NAME_IN_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in kebab case
- NAME_IN_LOWER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower kebab case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper kebab case
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
The default value is "MONTH_ABBREVIATION YEAR".
The default value is null.

The path to copy the HTML file to. If it is not provided, the HTML file will not be copied. The following placeholders can be used:
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits

The path to copy the PNG file to. If it is not provided, the PNG file will not be copied. The following placeholders can be used:
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number

- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits

markdown_path.description:
The path to copy the Markdown file to. If it is not provided, the Markdown file will not be copied. The following placeholders can be used:
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number

- NAME_IN_LOWER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower kebab case
- NAME_IN_UPPER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper kebab case
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month
- MONTH: Month as a number
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits
- YEAR: Year as a number
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits
The default value is "MONTH_ABBREVIATION YEAR".

markdown_path.title: Markdown Path

dont_generate_html.description: A boolean value to determine whether the HTML file will be generated. The default value is False.
dont_generate_html.title: Don't Generate HTML

dont_generate_markdown.description: A boolean value to determine whether the Markdown file will be generated. The default value is "false".
dont_generate_markdown.title: Don't Generate Markdown

dont_generate_png.description: A boolean value to determine whether the PNG file will be generated. The default value is False.
dont_generate_png.title: Don't Generate PNG

watch.description: A boolean value to determine whether to re-run RenderCV when the inputfile is updated. The default value is "false".
watch.title: Re-run RenderCV When the Input File is Updated

theme.title: Theme

SocialNetwork.description: This class is the data model of a social network.

username.description: The username of the social network. The link will be generated.
username.title: Username

SocialNetwork.title: SocialNetwork

rendercv__data__models__entry_types__Edu.description:
This class is the data model of `EducationEntry`. `EducationEntry` class is
created by combining the `EntryBase` and `EducationEntryBase` classes to have the
fields in the correct order.

date.description: The date field can be filled in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY formats or as an arbitrary string like "Fall 2023".
date.title: Date

start_date.description: The start date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format.
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: The end date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format. If the event is still ongoing, then type "present" or provide only the start_date.
end_date.title: End Date

highlights.description: The highlights of the event as a list of strings.
highlights.title: Highlights

rendercv__data__models__entry_types__Edu.title: EducationEntry

rendercv__data__models__entry_types__Exp.description:
This class is the data model of `ExperienceEntry`. `ExperienceEntry` class is
created by combining the `EntryBase` and `ExperienceEntryBase` classes to have the
fields in the correct order.

date.description: The date field can be filled in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY formats or as an arbitrary string like "Fall 2023".
date.title: Date

start_date.description: The start date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format.
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: The end date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format. If the event is still ongoing, then type "present" or provide only the start_date.
end_date.title: End Date

highlights.description: The highlights of the event as a list of strings.
highlights.title: Highlights

rendercv__data__models__entry_types__Exp.title: ExperienceEntry

rendercv__data__models__entry_types__Nor.description:
This class is the data model of `NormalEntry`. `NormalEntry` class is created by
combining the `EntryBase` and `NormalEntryBase` classes to have the fields in the
correct order.

date.description: The date field can be filled in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY formats or as an arbitrary string like "Fall 2023".
date.title: Date

start_date.description: The start date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format.
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: The end date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format. If the event is still ongoing, then type "present" or provide only the start_date.
end_date.title: End Date

highlights.description: The highlights of the event as a list of strings.
highlights.title: Highlights

rendercv__data__models__entry_types__Nor.title: NormalEntry

rendercv__data__models__entry_types__One.description: This class is the data model of `OneLineEntry`.
rendercv__data__models__entry_types__One.title: OneLineEntry

rendercv__data__models__entry_types__Pub.description:
This class is the data model of `PublicationEntry`. `PublicationEntry` class is
created by combining the `EntryWithDate` and `PublicationEntryBase` classes to have
the fields in the correct order.

authors.description: The authors of the publication in order as a list of strings.
authors.title: Authors

url.description: The URL of the publication. If DOI is provided, it will be ignored.
url.title: URL

date.description: The date field can be filled in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY formats or as an arbitrary string like "Fall 2023".
date.title: Date

rendercv__data__models__entry_types__Pub.title: PublicationEntry

main_column_first_row_template.description: The content of the Main Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_first_row_template.title: Main Column, First Row

degree_column_template.description: If given, a degree column will be added to the education entry. If "null", no degree column will be shown. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
degree_column_template.title: Template of the Degree Column

degree_column_width.description: The width of the degree column if the "degree_column_template" is given.
degree_column_width.title: Width of the Degree Column

main_column_second_row_template.description: The content of the second row of the Main Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_second_row_template.title: Main Column, Second Row

date_and_location_column_template.description: The content of the Date and Location Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
date_and_location_column_template.title: Date and Location Column

main_column_first_row_template.description: The content of the Main Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_first_row_template.title: Main Column, First Row

main_column_second_row_template.description: The content of the second row of the Main Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_second_row_template.title: Main Column, Second Row

date_and_location_column_template.description: The content of the Date and Location Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
date_and_location_column_template.title: Date and Location Column

name_font_size.description: The font size of the name in the header.
name_font_size.title: Name Font Size

name_bold.description: If this option is "true", the name in the header will be bold.
name_bold.title: Bold Name

photo_width.description: The width of the photo in the header.
photo_width.title: Width of the Photo

vertical_space_between_name_and_connecti.description: The vertical margin between the name of the person and the connections.
vertical_space_between_name_and_connecti.title: Vertical Margin Between the Name and Connections

vertical_space_between_connections_and_f.description: The vertical margin between the connections and the first section title.
vertical_space_between_connections_and_f.title: Vertical Margin Between Connections and First Section

horizontal_space_between_connections.description: The space between the connections (like phone, email, and website).
horizontal_space_between_connections.title: Space Between Connections

separator_between_connections.description: The separator between the connections in the header.
separator_between_connections.title: Separator Between Connections

use_icons_for_connections.description: If this option is "true", icons will be used for the connections (phone number, email, social networks, etc.) in the header.
use_icons_for_connections.title: Use Icons for Connections

bullet.description: The bullet used for the highlights and bullet entries.
bullet.title: Bullet

top_margin.description: The top margin of the highlights.
top_margin.title: Top Margin

left_margin.description: The left margin of the highlights.
left_margin.title: Left Margin

vertical_space_between_highlights.description: The vertical space between the highlights.
vertical_space_between_highlights.title: Vertical Space Between Highlights

horizontal_space_between_bullet_and_high.description: The horizontal space between the bullet and the highlight.
horizontal_space_between_bullet_and_high.title: Horizontal Space Between Bullet and Highlight

summary_left_margin.description: The left margin of the summary.
summary_left_margin.title: Left Margin of the Summary

underline.description: If this option is "true", links will be underlined.
underline.title: Underline Links

use_external_link_icon.description: If this option is "true", an external link icon will be shown next to the links.
use_external_link_icon.title: Use External Link Icon

main_column_first_row_template.description: The content of the Main Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_first_row_template.title: Main Column, First Row

main_column_second_row_template.description: The content of the second row of the Main Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_second_row_template.title: Main Column, Second Row

date_and_location_column_template.description: The content of the Date and Location Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
date_and_location_column_template.title: Date and Location Column

size.description: The page size of the CV.
size.title: Page Size

top_margin.description: The top margin of the page with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em)
top_margin.title: Top Margin

bottom_margin.description: The bottom margin of the page with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em)
bottom_margin.title: Bottom Margin

left_margin.description: The left margin of the page with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em)
left_margin.title: Left Margin

right_margin.description: The right margin of the page with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em)
right_margin.title: Right Margin

show_page_numbering.description: If this option is "true", the page numbering will be shown in the footer.
show_page_numbering.title: Show Page Numbering

show_last_updated_date.description: If this option is "true", the last updated date will be shown in the footer.
show_last_updated_date.title: Show Last Updated Date

type.description: The type of the section titles.
type.title: Line Type

font_size.description: The font size of the section titles.
font_size.title: Font Size

bold.description: If this option is "true", the section titles will be bold.
bold.title: Bold Section Titles

small_caps.description: If this option is "true", the section titles will be in small caps.
small_caps.title: Small Caps

line_thickness.description: The thickness of the line under the section titles.
line_thickness.title: Line Thickness

vertical_space_above.description: The vertical space above the section titles.
vertical_space_above.title: Vertical Space Above Section Titles

vertical_space_below.description: The vertical space below the section titles.
vertical_space_below.title: Vertical Space Below Section Titles

font_size.description: The font size of the text.
font_size.title: Font Size

leading.description: The vertical space between adjacent lines of text.
leading.title: Leading

date_and_location_column_alignment.description: The alignment of the date column in the entries.
date_and_location_column_alignment.title: Alignment of Date and Location Column

text.description:
The color of the text.
The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value.
text.title: Color of Text

name.description:
The color of the name in the header.
The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value.
name.title: Color of Name

connections.description:
The color of the connections in the header.
The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value.
connections.title: Color of Connections

section_titles.description:
The color of the section titles.
The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value.
section_titles.title: Color of Section Titles

links.description:
The color of the links.
The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value.
links.title: Color of Links

last_updated_date_and_page_numbering.description:
The color of the last updated date and page numbering.
The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value.
last_updated_date_and_page_numbering.title: Color of Last Updated Date and Page Numbering

main_column_first_row_template.description: The content of the Main Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_first_row_template.title: Main Column, First Row

degree_column_template.description: If given, a degree column will be added to the education entry. If "null", no degree column will be shown. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
degree_column_template.title: Template of the Degree Column

degree_column_width.description: The width of the degree column if the "degree_column_template" is given.
degree_column_width.title: Width of the Degree Column

main_column_second_row_template.description: The content of the second row of the Main Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
main_column_second_row_template.title: Main Column, Second Row

date_and_location_column_template.description: The content of the Date and Location Column. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase).
date_and_location_column_template.title: Date and Location Column

date_and_location_width.description: The width of the date and location in the entries.
date_and_location_width.title: Width of Date and Location

left_and_right_margin.description: The left and right margin of the entries.
left_and_right_margin.title: Left and Right Margin

horizontal_space_between_columns.description: The horizontal space between the columns in the entries.
horizontal_space_between_columns.title: Horizontal Space Between Columns

vertical_space_between_entries.description: The vertical space between the entries.
vertical_space_between_entries.title: Vertical Space Between Entries

allow_page_break_in_entries.description: If this option is "true", a page break will be allowed in the entries.
allow_page_break_in_entries.title: Allow Page Break in Entries

short_second_row.description: If this option is "true", second row will be shortened to leave the bottom of the date empty.
short_second_row.title: Short Second Row

show_time_spans_in.description: The list of section titles where the time spans will be shown in the entries.
show_time_spans_in.title: Show Time Spans in
